scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: babel static/js/app.js --out-file static/js/app.min.js --presets=@babel/preset-react && babel static/js/login.js --out-file static/js/login.min.js --presets=@babel/preset-react
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.watch:js: babel static/js/app.js --out-file static/js/app.min.js --presets=@babel/preset-react --watch & babel static/js/login.js --out-file static/js/login.min.js --presets=@babel/preset-react --watch
